entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
